42 // Kris
43 // 06.18.03 -- Removed comments/documentation; file too hard to edit otherwise. Will replace later.
44 // -- Begin conversion from <ScalarType> template to <OrdinalType, ScalarType>
45 // 06.23.03 -- Finished conversion from <ScalarType> to <OrdinalType, ScalarType>
46 // -- Tpetra_DenseMatrix.cpp is now obsolete
47 // -- Added new constructor to allow construction of a submatrix
48 // -- Altered copyMat to enable its use in new constructor
49 // -- Commented out broken print() function
50 // -- Fixed oneNorm() (uninitialized return variable was causing erroneous results)
51 // 06.24.03 -- Minor formatting changes
52 // 07.01.03 -- Added TempPrint() function to temporarily take the place of print() and operator<< while I figure out how to fix them
53 // 07.02.03 -- Added operator== and operator!= to make testing programs easier to write/read. Implementation of == isn't the most
54 // efficient/robust, but it works. Will consider optimizing later.
55 // -- Warning! Constructor DenseMatrix(DataAccess, const DenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &, int, int, int, int) (the
56 // "submatrix grabber" constructor) does not work correctly when used with CV == View (always grabs submatrix from top
57 // left corner).
58 // 07.07.03 -- Constructor bug detailed above (07.02) is now corrected (hopefully).
59 // 07.08.03 -- Move into Teuchos package/namespace

415 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
416 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::SerialDenseMatrix()
417  : CompObject(), Object("Teuchos::SerialDenseMatrix"), numRows_(0), numCols_(0), stride_(0), valuesCopied_(false), values_(0)
418 {}
419 
420 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
421 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::SerialDenseMatrix(
422  OrdinalType numRows_in, OrdinalType numCols_in, bool zeroOut
423  )
424  : CompObject(), Object("Teuchos::SerialDenseMatrix"), numRows_(numRows_in), numCols_(numCols_in), stride_(numRows_in)
425 {
426  values_ = new ScalarType[stride_*numCols_];
427  valuesCopied_ = true;
428  if (zeroOut == true)
429  putScalar();
430 }
431 
432 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
433 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::SerialDenseMatrix(
434  DataAccess CV, ScalarType* values_in, OrdinalType stride_in, OrdinalType numRows_in,
435  OrdinalType numCols_in
436  )
437  : CompObject(), Object("Teuchos::SerialDenseMatrix"), numRows_(numRows_in), numCols_(numCols_in), stride_(stride_in),
438  valuesCopied_(false), values_(values_in)
439 {
440  if(CV == Copy)
441  {
442  stride_ = numRows_;
443  values_ = new ScalarType[stride_*numCols_];
444  copyMat(values_in, stride_in, numRows_, numCols_, values_, stride_, 0, 0);
445  valuesCopied_ = true;
446  }
447 }
448 
449 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
450 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::SerialDenseMatrix(const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &Source, ETransp trans) : CompObject(), Object("Teuchos::SerialDenseMatrix"), numRows_(0), numCols_(0), stride_(0), valuesCopied_(true), values_(0)
451 {
452  if ( trans == Teuchos::NO_TRANS )
453  {
454  numRows_ = Source.numRows_;
455  numCols_ = Source.numCols_;
456 
457  if (!Source.valuesCopied_)
458  {
459  stride_ = Source.stride_;
460  values_ = Source.values_;
461  valuesCopied_ = false;
462  }
463  else
464  {
465  stride_ = numRows_;
466  const OrdinalType newsize = stride_ * numCols_;
467  if(newsize > 0) {
468  values_ = new ScalarType[newsize];
469  copyMat(Source.values_, Source.stride_, numRows_, numCols_, values_, stride_, 0, 0);
470  }
471  else {
472  numRows_ = 0; numCols_ = 0; stride_ = 0;
473  valuesCopied_ = false;
474  }
475  }
476  }
477  else if ( trans == Teuchos::CONJ_TRANS && ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::isComplex )
478  {
479  numRows_ = Source.numCols_;
480  numCols_ = Source.numRows_;
481  stride_ = numRows_;
482  values_ = new ScalarType[stride_*numCols_];
483  for (OrdinalType j=0; j<numCols_; j++) {
484  for (OrdinalType i=0; i<numRows_; i++) {
485  values_[j*stride_ + i] = Teuchos::ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::conjugate(Source.values_[i*Source.stride_ + j]);
486  }
487  }
488  }
489  else
490  {
491  numRows_ = Source.numCols_;
492  numCols_ = Source.numRows_;
493  stride_ = numRows_;
494  values_ = new ScalarType[stride_*numCols_];
495  for (OrdinalType j=0; j<numCols_; j++) {
496  for (OrdinalType i=0; i<numRows_; i++) {
497  values_[j*stride_ + i] = Source.values_[i*Source.stride_ + j];
498  }
499  }
500  }
501 }
502 
503 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
504 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::SerialDenseMatrix(
505  DataAccess CV, const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &Source,
506  OrdinalType numRows_in, OrdinalType numCols_in, OrdinalType startRow,
507  OrdinalType startCol
508  )
509  : CompObject(), Object("Teuchos::SerialDenseMatrix"), numRows_(numRows_in), numCols_(numCols_in), stride_(Source.stride_),
510  valuesCopied_(false), values_(Source.values_)
511 {
512  if(CV == Copy)
513  {
514  stride_ = numRows_in;
515  values_ = new ScalarType[stride_ * numCols_in];
516  copyMat(Source.values_, Source.stride_, numRows_in, numCols_in, values_, stride_, startRow, startCol);
517  valuesCopied_ = true;
518  }
519  else // CV == View
520  {
521  values_ = values_ + (stride_ * startCol) + startRow;
522  }
523 }
524 
525 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
526 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::~SerialDenseMatrix()
527 {
528  deleteArrays();
529 }
530 
531 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
532 // Shape methods
533 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
534 
535 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
536 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::shape(
537  OrdinalType numRows_in, OrdinalType numCols_in
538  )
539 {
540  deleteArrays(); // Get rid of anything that might be already allocated
541  numRows_ = numRows_in;
542  numCols_ = numCols_in;
543  stride_ = numRows_;
544  values_ = new ScalarType[stride_*numCols_];
545  putScalar();
546  valuesCopied_ = true;
547  return(0);
548 }
549 
550 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
551 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::shapeUninitialized(
552  OrdinalType numRows_in, OrdinalType numCols_in
553  )
554 {
555  deleteArrays(); // Get rid of anything that might be already allocated
556  numRows_ = numRows_in;
557  numCols_ = numCols_in;
558  stride_ = numRows_;
559  values_ = new ScalarType[stride_*numCols_];
560  valuesCopied_ = true;
561  return(0);
562 }
563 
564 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
565 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::reshape(
566  OrdinalType numRows_in, OrdinalType numCols_in
567  )
568 {
569  // Allocate space for new matrix
570  ScalarType* values_tmp = new ScalarType[numRows_in * numCols_in];
571  ScalarType zero = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero();
572  for(OrdinalType k = 0; k < numRows_in * numCols_in; k++)
573  {
574  values_tmp[k] = zero;
575  }
576  OrdinalType numRows_tmp = TEUCHOS_MIN(numRows_, numRows_in);
577  OrdinalType numCols_tmp = TEUCHOS_MIN(numCols_, numCols_in);
578  if(values_ != 0)
579  {
580  copyMat(values_, stride_, numRows_tmp, numCols_tmp, values_tmp,
581  numRows_in, 0, 0); // Copy principal submatrix of A to new A
582  }
583  deleteArrays(); // Get rid of anything that might be already allocated
584  numRows_ = numRows_in;
585  numCols_ = numCols_in;
586  stride_ = numRows_;
587  values_ = values_tmp; // Set pointer to new A
588  valuesCopied_ = true;
589  return(0);
590 }
591 
592 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
593 // Set methods
594 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
595 
596 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
597 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::putScalar( const ScalarType value_in )
598 {
599  // Set each value of the dense matrix to "value".
600  for(OrdinalType j = 0; j < numCols_; j++)
601  {
602  for(OrdinalType i = 0; i < numRows_; i++)
603  {
604  values_[i + j*stride_] = value_in;
605  }
606  }
607  return 0;
608 }
609 
610 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
611 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::random()
612 {
613  // Set each value of the dense matrix to a random value.
614  for(OrdinalType j = 0; j < numCols_; j++)
615  {
616  for(OrdinalType i = 0; i < numRows_; i++)
617  {
618  values_[i + j*stride_] = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::random();
619  }
620  }
621  return 0;
622 }
623 
624 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
625 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>&
626 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator=(
627  const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>& Source
628  )
629 {
630  if(this == &Source)
631  return(*this); // Special case of source same as target
632  if((!valuesCopied_) && (!Source.valuesCopied_) && (values_ == Source.values_))
633  return(*this); // Special case of both are views to same data.
634 
635  // If the source is a view then we will return a view, else we will return a copy.
636  if (!Source.valuesCopied_) {
637  if(valuesCopied_) {
638  // Clean up stored data if this was previously a copy.
639  deleteArrays();
640  }
641  numRows_ = Source.numRows_;
642  numCols_ = Source.numCols_;
643  stride_ = Source.stride_;
644  values_ = Source.values_;
645  }
646  else {
647  // If we were a view, we will now be a copy.
648  if(!valuesCopied_) {
649  numRows_ = Source.numRows_;
650  numCols_ = Source.numCols_;
651  stride_ = Source.numRows_;
652  const OrdinalType newsize = stride_ * numCols_;
653  if(newsize > 0) {
654  values_ = new ScalarType[newsize];
655  valuesCopied_ = true;
656  }
657  else {
658  values_ = 0;
659  }
660  }
661  // If we were a copy, we will stay a copy.
662  else {
663  if((Source.numRows_ <= stride_) && (Source.numCols_ == numCols_)) { // we don't need to reallocate
664  numRows_ = Source.numRows_;
665  numCols_ = Source.numCols_;
666  }
667  else { // we need to allocate more space (or less space)
668  deleteArrays();
669  numRows_ = Source.numRows_;
670  numCols_ = Source.numCols_;
671  stride_ = Source.numRows_;
672  const OrdinalType newsize = stride_ * numCols_;
673  if(newsize > 0) {
674  values_ = new ScalarType[newsize];
675  valuesCopied_ = true;
676  }
677  }
678  }
679  copyMat(Source.values_, Source.stride_, numRows_, numCols_, values_, stride_, 0, 0);
680  }
681  return(*this);
682 }
683 
684 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
685 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator+= (const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>& Source )
686 {
687  // Check for compatible dimensions
688  if ((numRows_ != Source.numRows_) || (numCols_ != Source.numCols_))
689  {
690  TEUCHOS_CHK_REF(*this); // Return *this without altering it.
691  }
692  copyMat(Source.values_, Source.stride_, numRows_, numCols_, values_, stride_, 0, 0, ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::one());
693  return(*this);
694 }
695 
696 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
697 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator-= (const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>& Source )
698 {
699  // Check for compatible dimensions
700  if ((numRows_ != Source.numRows_) || (numCols_ != Source.numCols_))
701  {
702  TEUCHOS_CHK_REF(*this); // Return *this without altering it.
703  }
704  copyMat(Source.values_, Source.stride_, numRows_, numCols_, values_, stride_, 0, 0, -ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::one());
705  return(*this);
706 }
707 
708 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
709 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>& SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::assign (const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>& Source) {
710  if(this == &Source)
711  return(*this); // Special case of source same as target
712  if((!valuesCopied_) && (!Source.valuesCopied_) && (values_ == Source.values_))
713  return(*this); // Special case of both are views to same data.
714 
715  // Check for compatible dimensions
716  if ((numRows_ != Source.numRows_) || (numCols_ != Source.numCols_))
717  {
718  TEUCHOS_CHK_REF(*this); // Return *this without altering it.
719  }
720  copyMat(Source.values_, Source.stride_, numRows_, numCols_, values_, stride_, 0, 0);
721  return(*this);
722 }
723

725 // Accessor methods

728 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
729 inline ScalarType& SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator () (OrdinalType rowIndex, OrdinalType colIndex)
730 {
731 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
732  checkIndex( rowIndex, colIndex );
733 #endif
734  return(values_[colIndex * stride_ + rowIndex]);
735 }
736 
737 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
738 inline const ScalarType& SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator () (OrdinalType rowIndex, OrdinalType colIndex) const
739 {
740 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
741  checkIndex( rowIndex, colIndex );
742 #endif
743  return(values_[colIndex * stride_ + rowIndex]);
744 }
745 
746 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
747 inline const ScalarType* SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator [] (OrdinalType colIndex) const
748 {
749 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
750  checkIndex( 0, colIndex );
751 #endif
752  return(values_ + colIndex * stride_);
753 }
754 
755 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
756 inline ScalarType* SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator [] (OrdinalType colIndex)
757 {
758 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
759  checkIndex( 0, colIndex );
760 #endif
761  return(values_ + colIndex * stride_);
762 }
763 
764 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
765 // Norm methods
766 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
767 
768 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
769 typename ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitudeType SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::normOne() const
770 {
771  OrdinalType i, j;
772  typename ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitudeType anorm = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero());
773  typename ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitudeType absSum = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero());
774  ScalarType* ptr;
775  for(j = 0; j < numCols_; j++)
776  {
777  ScalarType sum = 0;
778  ptr = values_ + j * stride_;
779  for(i = 0; i < numRows_; i++)
780  {
781  sum += ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(*ptr++);
782  }
783  absSum = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(sum);
784  if(absSum > anorm)
785  {
786  anorm = absSum;
787  }
788  }
789  updateFlops(numRows_ * numCols_);
790  return(anorm);
791 }
792 
793 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
794 typename ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitudeType SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::normInf() const
795 {
796  OrdinalType i, j;
797  typename ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitudeType sum, anorm = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero());
798 
799  for (i = 0; i < numRows_; i++) {
800  sum = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero());
801  for (j=0; j< numCols_; j++) {
802  sum += ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(*(values_+i+j*stride_));
803  }
804  anorm = TEUCHOS_MAX( anorm, sum );
805  }
806  updateFlops(numRows_ * numCols_);
807  return(anorm);
808 }
809 
810 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
811 typename ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitudeType SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::normFrobenius() const
812 {
813  OrdinalType i, j;
814  typename ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitudeType anorm = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero());
815  for (j = 0; j < numCols_; j++) {
816  for (i = 0; i < numRows_; i++) {
817  anorm += ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(values_[i+j*stride_]*values_[i+j*stride_]);
818  }
819  }
820  anorm = ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::magnitude(ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::squareroot(anorm));
821  updateFlops(numRows_ * numCols_);
822  return(anorm);
823 }
824 
825 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
826 // Comparison methods
827 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
828 
829 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
830 bool SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator== (const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &Operand) const
831 {
832  bool result = 1;
833  if((numRows_ != Operand.numRows_) || (numCols_ != Operand.numCols_))
834  {
835  result = 0;
836  }
837  else
838  {
839  OrdinalType i, j;
840  for(i = 0; i < numRows_; i++)
841  {
842  for(j = 0; j < numCols_; j++)
843  {
844  if((*this)(i, j) != Operand(i, j))
845  {
846  return 0;
847  }
848  }
849  }
850  }
851  return result;
852 }
853 
854 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
855 bool SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator!= (const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &Operand) const
856 {
857  return !((*this) == Operand);
858 }
859 
860 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
861 // Multiplication method
862 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
863 
864 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
865 SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>& SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::operator*= (const ScalarType alpha )
866 {
867  this->scale( alpha );
868  return(*this);
869 }
870 
871 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
872 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::scale( const ScalarType alpha )
873 {
874  OrdinalType i, j;
875  ScalarType* ptr;
876 
877  for (j=0; j<numCols_; j++) {
878  ptr = values_ + j*stride_;
879  for (i=0; i<numRows_; i++) { *ptr = alpha * (*ptr); ptr++; }
880  }
881  updateFlops( numRows_*numCols_ );
882  return(0);
883 }
884 
885 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
886 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::scale( const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType,ScalarType>& A )
887 {
888  OrdinalType i, j;
889  ScalarType* ptr;
890 
891  // Check for compatible dimensions
892  if ((numRows_ != A.numRows_) || (numCols_ != A.numCols_))
893  {
894  TEUCHOS_CHK_ERR(-1); // Return error
895  }
896  for (j=0; j<numCols_; j++) {
897  ptr = values_ + j*stride_;
898  for (i=0; i<numRows_; i++) { *ptr = A(i,j) * (*ptr); ptr++; }
899  }
900  updateFlops( numRows_*numCols_ );
901  return(0);
902 }
903 
904 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
905 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::multiply(ETransp transa, ETransp transb, ScalarType alpha, const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &A, const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &B, ScalarType beta)
906 {
907  // Check for compatible dimensions
908  OrdinalType A_nrows = (ETranspChar[transa]!='N') ? A.numCols() : A.numRows();
909  OrdinalType A_ncols = (ETranspChar[transa]!='N') ? A.numRows() : A.numCols();
910  OrdinalType B_nrows = (ETranspChar[transb]!='N') ? B.numCols() : B.numRows();
911  OrdinalType B_ncols = (ETranspChar[transb]!='N') ? B.numRows() : B.numCols();
912  if ((numRows_ != A_nrows) || (A_ncols != B_nrows) || (numCols_ != B_ncols))
913  {
914  TEUCHOS_CHK_ERR(-1); // Return error
915  }
916  // Call GEMM function
917  this->GEMM(transa, transb, numRows_, numCols_, A_ncols, alpha, A.values(), A.stride(), B.values(), B.stride(), beta, values_, stride_);
918  double nflops = 2 * numRows_;
919  nflops *= numCols_;
920  nflops *= A_ncols;
921  updateFlops(nflops);
922  return(0);
923 }
924 
925 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
926 int SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::multiply (ESide sideA, ScalarType alpha, const SerialSymDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &A, const SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType> &B, ScalarType beta)
927 {
928  // Check for compatible dimensions
929  OrdinalType A_nrows = A.numRows(), A_ncols = A.numCols();
930  OrdinalType B_nrows = B.numRows(), B_ncols = B.numCols();
931 
932  if (ESideChar[sideA]=='L') {
933  if ((numRows_ != A_nrows) || (A_ncols != B_nrows) || (numCols_ != B_ncols)) {
934  TEUCHOS_CHK_ERR(-1); // Return error
935  }
936  } else {
937  if ((numRows_ != B_nrows) || (B_ncols != A_nrows) || (numCols_ != A_ncols)) {
938  TEUCHOS_CHK_ERR(-1); // Return error
939  }
940  }
941 
942  // Call SYMM function
943  EUplo uplo = (A.upper() ? Teuchos::UPPER_TRI : Teuchos::LOWER_TRI);
944  this->SYMM(sideA, uplo, numRows_, numCols_, alpha, A.values(), A.stride(), B.values(), B.stride(), beta, values_, stride_);
945  double nflops = 2 * numRows_;
946  nflops *= numCols_;
947  nflops *= A_ncols;
948  updateFlops(nflops);
949  return(0);
950 }
951 
952 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
953 void SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::print(std::ostream& os) const
954 {
955  os << std::endl;
956  if(valuesCopied_)
957  os << "Values_copied : yes" << std::endl;
958  else
959  os << "Values_copied : no" << std::endl;
960  os << "Rows : " << numRows_ << std::endl;
961  os << "Columns : " << numCols_ << std::endl;
962  os << "LDA : " << stride_ << std::endl;
963  if(numRows_ == 0 || numCols_ == 0) {
964  os << "(matrix is empty, no values to display)" << std::endl;
965  } else {
966  for(OrdinalType i = 0; i < numRows_; i++) {
967  for(OrdinalType j = 0; j < numCols_; j++){
968  os << (*this)(i,j) << " ";
969  }
970  os << std::endl;
971  }
972  }
973 }
974 
975 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
976 // Protected methods
977 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
978 
979 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
980 inline void SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::checkIndex( OrdinalType rowIndex, OrdinalType colIndex ) const {
981  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex >= numRows_, std::out_of_range,
982  "SerialDenseMatrix<T>::checkIndex: "
983  "Row index " << rowIndex << " out of range [0, "<< numRows_ << ")");
984  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(colIndex < 0 || colIndex >= numCols_, std::out_of_range,
985  "SerialDenseMatrix<T>::checkIndex: "
986  "Col index " << colIndex << " out of range [0, "<< numCols_ << ")");
987 }
988 
989 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
990 void SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::deleteArrays(void)
991 {
992  if (valuesCopied_)
993  {
994  delete [] values_;
995  values_ = 0;
996  valuesCopied_ = false;
997  }
998 }
999 
1000 template<typename OrdinalType, typename ScalarType>
1001 void SerialDenseMatrix<OrdinalType, ScalarType>::copyMat(
1002  ScalarType* inputMatrix, OrdinalType strideInput, OrdinalType numRows_in,
1003  OrdinalType numCols_in, ScalarType* outputMatrix, OrdinalType strideOutput,
1004  OrdinalType startRow, OrdinalType startCol, ScalarType alpha
1005  )
1006 {
1007  OrdinalType i, j;
1008  ScalarType* ptr1 = 0;
1009  ScalarType* ptr2 = 0;
1010  for(j = 0; j < numCols_in; j++) {
1011  ptr1 = outputMatrix + (j * strideOutput);
1012  ptr2 = inputMatrix + (j + startCol) * strideInput + startRow;
1013  if (alpha != Teuchos::ScalarTraits<ScalarType>::zero() ) {
1014  for(i = 0; i < numRows_in; i++)
1015  {
1016  *ptr1++ += alpha*(*ptr2++);
1017  }
1018  } else {
1019  for(i = 0; i < numRows_in; i++)
1020  {
1021  *ptr1++ = *ptr2++;
1022  }
1023  }
1024  }
1025 }
